entities.name: AUGUST 27, 2024The key items discussed  during the August 27, 2024 Regular Board Meeting include:

Facilities Project UpdateOn October 10th, 2023, the Board approved Implementation Plan 3a_rv.3. Today Staff will update the progress of the currently activeprojects with budget information. Staff will also report and update current and expected Facilities related revenue.
